functions.tag:
{     
								title:"UHC CONTROL BOOK", 
								author:"ArmouredMonkey",
								pages: [
									'[
										{"text":""},{"text":"UHC CONTROL BOOK", "color":"#AD8608", "clickEvent":{"action":"open_url", "value":"https://sites.google.com/view/monkeyarmoury/uhc"}, "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Click on title to get link to download website.\\n\\nClick options below to jump to page. Hover over text to get more information.\\nPress Start once settings have been chosen and all players have been asigned to a team."}},
										{"text":"\\n\\nTeams", "color":"#FFC300", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"2"}},
										{"text":"\\nOptions", "color":"#FFC300", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"3"}},
										{"text":"\\nScoreboards", "color":"#FFC300", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"4"}},
										{"text":"\\nWorld Border", "color":"#FFC300", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"5"}},
										{"text":"\\nEternal Time", "color":"#FFC300", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"6"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\nStart", "color":"#0FF992", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/schedule function uhc:countdown_a 10t"}, "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Only press Start once all configurations have been made and all players are assigned to a team."}},
										{"text":"\\n\\nPack made by ArmouredMonkey", "color":"#463603"}
									]',
									'[
										{"text":""},{"text":"Teams", "color":"#AD8608", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"All players can use the team selector to join, leave or change their team. Admins can use the Randomise Teams buttons to create random teams of the selected number."}}, {"text":"                   \\u00AB", "color":"#0FF092", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"1"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n     Team Selector", "color":"#FFC300"}, 
										{"text":"\\n      \\u2B1B", "color":"blue", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 1"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"dark_aqua", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 2"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"dark_blue", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 3"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"dark_green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 4"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"dark_purple", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 5"}}, {"text":" \\u2717", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Leave Team"}, "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 12"}}, 
										{"text":"\\n      \\u2B1B", "color":"dark_red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 6"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"gold", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 7"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 8"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"light_purple", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 9"}}, {"text":" \\u2B1B", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 10"}}, {"text":" \\u272a", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Spectator"}, "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/trigger uhc.team set 11"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n   Randomise Teams", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Click number below to select amount of players on each team."}},
										{"text":"\\n      2", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:teams/randomise_teams_two"}}, {"text":"   3", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:teams/randomise_teams_three"}}, {"text":"   4", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:teams/randomise_teams_four"}}, {"text":"   5", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:teams/randomise_teams_five"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n        Solo Only", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Click this for solo teams only."}, "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:teams/solo"}},
										{"text":"\\n      Allow Teams", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Click this for teams only. This does not allow solo play"}, "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:teams/unsolo"}}
									]',
									'[
										{"text":""},{"text":"Options", "color":"#AD8608", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Hover over each option for more details. Use the Yes/No toggle to choose your settings. An actionbar message will show when you change a setting."}}, {"text":"                 \\u00AB", "color":"#0FF092", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"1"}},  
										{"text":"\\n\\n       Gamerules", "color":"#FFC300"},
										{"text":"\\nAdvancements:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Advancements are announced in chat. Default: Yes/True."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/announce_advancements_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/announce_advancements_false"}},
										{"text":"\\nFire Spread:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Fire can spread. Default: Yes/True."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/fire_tick_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/fire_tick_false"}},
										{"text":"\\nFriendly Fire:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Team members are able to hit each other. Default: Yes/True."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/friendly_fire_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/friendly_fire_false"}},
										{"text":"\\nPatrols:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Pillager patrols can spawn. Default: Yes/True."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/patrol_spawning_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/patrol_spawning_false"}},
										{"text":"\\nPhantoms:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Phantoms can spawn/Insomnia happens. Default: Yes/True."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/phantom_spawning_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/phantom_spawning_false"}},
										{"text":"\\nRaids:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Raids can happen. Default: Yes/True."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/raids_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/raids_false"}},
										{"text":"\\nRegeneration:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Players regenerate health from eating. Default: No/False."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/regeneration_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/regeneration_false"}},
										{"text":"\\nTrader:", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"The wandering trader can spawn. Default: Yes/True."}}, {"text":" Yes", "color":"green", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/trader_true"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"No", "color":"red", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/trader_false"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n    Gentlemans Rule", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"PvP should not happen within this time. \\nNote: Due to limitations in Minecraft, this cannot be enforced."}}, 
										{"text":"\\n      20", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/gentlemensrule/20"}}, {"text":"  40", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/gentlemensrule/40"}}, {"text":"  60", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/gentlemensrule/60"}}, {"text":"  \\u2717", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"No Gentlemans Rule"}, "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/gentlemensrule/clear"}}
									]',
									'[
										{"text":""},{"text":"Scoreboards", "color":"#AD8608", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Choose what statistic is displayed in the Tab-List. Health can be shown as either Hearts or Numbers."}}, {"text":"          \\u00AB", "color":"#0FF092", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"1"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\nNone", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/scoreboard objectives setdisplay list"}},
										{"text":"\\nHealth:", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/scoreboard objectives setdisplay list uhc.health"}}, {"text":" Heart", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/scoreboard objectives modify uhc.health rendertype hearts"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"Number", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/scoreboard objectives modify uhc.health rendertype integer"}},
										{"text":"\\nTotal Kills", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/scoreboard objectives setdisplay list uhc.kills"}}
									]',
									'[
										{"text":""},{"text":"World Border", "color":"#AD8608", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"Configure the world border. Hover over the different settings for more information."}}, {"text":"          \\u00AB", "color":"#0FF092", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"1"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n      Starting Size", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"The size at which the world border will start at."}},
										{"text":"\\n 4096", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/start/4096"}}, {"text":" 2048", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/start/2048"}}, {"text":" 1024", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/start/1024"}}, {"text":" 512", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/start/512"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n        Final Size", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"The size at which the world border will stop shrinking at."}},
										{"text":"\\n   256", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/end/256"}}, {"text":" 128", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/end/128"}}, {"text":" 64", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/end/64"}}, {"text":" 32", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/end/32"}}, {"text":" 16", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/end/16"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n      Shrink Start", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"The time at which the world border will begin to shrink."}},
										{"text":"\\n   20", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/shrink/20"}}, {"text":" 40", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/shrink/40"}}, {"text":" 60", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/shrink/60"}}, {"text":" 80", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/shrink/80"}}, {"text":" 100", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/shrink/100"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\n    Shrink Duration", "color":"#FFC300", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"The length of time that it will take for the world border to shrink to the final size."}},
										{"text":"\\n   20", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/duration/20"}}, {"text":" 40", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/duration/40"}}, {"text":" 60", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/duration/60"}}, {"text":" 80", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/duration/80"}}, {"text":" 100", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:border/duration/100"}}
									]',
									'[
										{"text":""},{"text":"Eternal Time", "color":"#AD8608", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"The daylight cycle will stop and it will turn to day or night depending on what setting you use below."}}, {"text":"           \\u00AB", "color":"#0FF092", "clickEvent":{"action":"change_page", "value":"1"}},
										{"text":"\\n\\nDay", "color":"#FFC300", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/day"}}, {"text":"/", "color":"#463603"}, {"text":"Night", "color":"#FFC300", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/night"}}, {"text":"              "}, {"text":"\\u2717", "color":"#463603", "hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text", "value":"No Eternal Time"}, "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/clear"}},
										{"text":"\\n0", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/0"}}, {"text":" 20", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/20"}}, {"text":" 40", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/40"}}, {"text":" 60", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/60"}}, {"text":" 80", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/80"}}, {"text":" 100", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/100"}}, {"text":" 120", "color":"#463603", "clickEvent":{"action":"run_command", "value":"/function uhc:options/eternaltime/120"}}
									]'
								]	
							}
